body: When you run `spack module refresh --help`, it queries `spack.modules.module_types` to get a list of choices for `--module-type`. But regardless of whether or not `tcl` is in your list of enabled modules, the default is always `tcl`. We should default to whatever is enabled. If there are multiple module types enabled, then we should refresh all of them.
title: Better default for spack module refresh
